item.title: Announcements: Energi
item.dc:creator: Corey Petty
item.description: Guests: Ryan Lucchese, President of Energi Core Welcome to Announcements, hosted by Lucian, a show that provides you details on current events, upcoming projects in the blockchain space, and token offering details. We are attempting to provide you with details and information from the people who are creating projects, and we are not giving advice. […]
